title: Senior DevOps Engineer
education: Landmark University, Nigeria. B.Sc. Accounting, Oct 2011 - July 2015
profile_summary: Well-rounded professional with 8 years of IT experience across tier 1–3 support, cloud services, environment architecting, deployment, and monitoring. 5+ years hands-on with AWS and experience with multi-cloud (Azure, GCP, DigitalOcean). Strong background in IaC, containerization (Docker, ECS, Kubernetes), CI/CD pipelines, monitoring (Datadog, CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana), and cloud security (WAF, GuardDuty, IAM, SNYK). Experienced in documentation, debugging, and collaborating with development teams to deliver scalable, secure cloud infrastructure.

projects_experience.overview: Architected and maintained cloud infrastructure and IaC solutions for multiple environments; implemented container orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring to improve reliability and reduce MTTR.
responsibilities: Architected and maintained infrastructure-as-code using ARM templates and Bicep for declarative provisioning.
Provisioned and orchestrated containerized workloads on AKS using HPA, Pod Disruption Budgets, and custom node pools.
Developed CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps YAML, including gated approvals, artifact promotion, and automated rollback.
Designed and deployed scalable infrastructure using Pulumi with TypeScript on Azure.
Packaged and deployed microservices into Kubernetes clusters using Helm charts.
Implemented Datadog APM and infrastructure monitoring, reducing MTTR by 40%.
Provisioned AWS resources (EC2, VPC, ELB, AutoScaling) and managed AWS-based environments.
Used CloudFormation and Terraform to automate provisioning and manage environments.
Built and integrated CI/CD and build frameworks (Jenkins, Maven, Ansible, Nexus).
tech_stack: AWS (EC2, VPC, ELB, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, CloudTrail, SNS, SQS)

projects_experience.project_title: Cloud DevOps Engineer — Access Bank PLC
projects_experience.overview: Engineered and deployed scalable cloud-native infrastructure across multi-cloud environments, implemented monitoring, security hardening, and CI/CD automation to support enterprise applications.
responsibilities: Deployed scalable infrastructure using Pulumi with TypeScript for repeatable deployments on Azure.
Packaged and deployed microservices to Kubernetes via Helm charts to optimize CI/CD.
Integrated Datadog for APM and infrastructure monitoring, improving incident response.
Optimized EC2 EBS volumes and managed multi-cloud automation using Morpheus.
Implemented cloud security controls using GuardDuty, Macie, AWS Inspector, and tightened ACLs and firewalls.
Deployed GCP services (Compute Engine, Cloud Run, Dataflow, BigQuery, GCS) for specific projects.
Used Security Monkey and CloudTracker for auditing and anomaly monitoring of AWS accounts.
Configured automated provisioning and patching using Ansible and Terraform.
Managed VMware VMs and ESX host migrations; created VM templates.
tech_stack: GCP (Compute Engine, Cloud Run, Dataflow, BigQuery, GCS)

projects_experience.overview: Implemented continuous delivery frameworks and automated infrastructure provisioning across environments using a mix of CI/CD tools and IaC solutions.
responsibilities: Implemented Continuous Delivery using Jenkins, Ansible, Maven and Nexus in Linux environments.
Built pipelines to deploy applications to AWS and integrated CI/CD across teams.
Used CloudFormation to automate AWS resource provisioning and invoked Puppet for server configuration.
Automated infrastructure provisioning with Terraform modules for staging and production.
Created Docker images and managed container lifecycle, snapshots, and volumes.
Configured SNS for notifications based on CloudFormation events.
Created and maintained hybrid Kubernetes clusters and their supporting components (storage, monitoring, logging).
